label: Do any of the following apply to this program/event?
description: Check all that apply.  If any of the above are checked, the Event Security Checklist will appear at the end of this form.  Note: Events occurring outside normal business hours require approval and will incur an additional security expense.
name: do_any_of_the_following_apply_to_this_programevent

options.label: Occurs outside the MJCCA's normal hours of operation
options.value: Occurs outside the MJCCA's normal hours of operation

options.label: May impact or interfere with another MJCCA program or service (e.g. other events occurring simultaneously, requires 50+ parking spaces, etc.)
options.value: May impact or interfere with another MJCCA program or service (e.g. other events occurring simultaneously, requires 50+ parking spaces, etc.)
